results.title: Metformin Prevents Cocaine Sensitization: Involvement of Adenosine Monophosphate-Activated Protein Kinase Trafficking between Subcellular Compartments in the Corticostriatal Reward Circuit
results.text_hl: The rationale for these studies was to inform our understanding of @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@ activation dynamics in subcellular compartments and provide additional support for repurposing @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for treating @<m>DISEASE_Cocaine_Related_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019970 @@@cocaine use disorder@@@.

citations.NLM: Aruldas R, Orenstein LB, Spencer S. Metformin Prevents Cocaine Sensitization: Involvement of Adenosine Monophosphate-Activated Protein Kinase Trafficking between Subcellular Compartments in the Corticostriatal Reward Circuit Int J Mol Sci. 2023 Nov 28;24(23):. PMID: 38069180
citations.BibTeX: @article{38069180, title={Metformin Prevents Cocaine Sensitization: Involvement of Adenosine Monophosphate-Activated Protein Kinase Trafficking between Subcellular Compartments in the Corticostriatal Reward Circuit}, author={Aruldas R and Orenstein LB and Spencer S}, journal={Int J Mol Sci}, volume={24}, number={23}}

results.title: Metformin in nucleus accumbens core reduces cue-induced cocaine seeking in male and female rats
results.text_hl: These data support a potential role for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as a pharmacotherapy for @<m>DISEASE_Cocaine_Related_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019970 @@@cocaine use disorder@@@ but warrant caution given the potential for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s effects to generalize to a natural reward in female @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Chan A, Willard A, Mulloy S, Ibrahim N, Sciaccotta A, Schonfeld M, Spencer SM. Metformin in nucleus accumbens core reduces cue-induced cocaine seeking in male and female rats Addict Biol. 2022 May;27(3):e13165. PMID: 35470560
